About.title: Parkhurst Medical
About.metaDescription: Get to know us and our vision
About.firstSection: We offer comprehensive services related to ordering, distributing and selling medical marijuana.
About.secondSection: Thanks to many years of experience, we can guarantee our customers a high-quality product that meets the highest global standards.
About.thirdSection: We have our own farms in South Africa, so we have insight and influence over the production process at every stage. Our products are not only legal, but also meet strict criteria for safety, purity, and efficacy in treatment.
About.fourthSection: By operating in accordance with the above standards, we contribute to the creation of ethical standards in the medical marijuana industry in Poland.
About.ferry: We organize logistics through licensed suppliers that meet the requirements of medical transport. As a result, our customers can be sure that the ordered product is transported in accordance with the highest safety standards, in accordance with applicable laws.
About.security: The control and  production is carried out in accordance with the EU GMP (European Union Good Manufacturing Practice) standards and all applicable laws. Customers can be sure that they are receiving a product that meets the highest quality standards.
About.transport: We provide transport of goods directly from the manufacturer to the customer's company. By eliminating unnecessary intermediation during transport, we guarantee that the goods will be delivered and their quality will not change during the delivery process.

Footer.companyName: Parkhurst Medical sp. z o. o.

Home.title: Parkhurst Medical
Home.description: Shaping the future of cannabinoid therapy in Poland together
Home.for: For a better quality of life
Home.more_1: Everyone has the right to a high quality of life, we believe that health and well-being are integral part  to  fulfilling a healthy balance.
Home.more_2: Our company's mission is to enable patients to use the full potential of medical marijuana. We believe in a holistic approach to health that incorporates natural methods of healing and rebalancing the body.
Home.liveQuality: Quality of life and symptom relief
Home.ourProducts: Our innovative products and services are designed to support therapy and facilitate access to medical cannabis, especially when standard therapy does not bring the expected results or generates undesirable effects. We understand that every patient has unique needs, which is why we offer tailor-made solutions.
Home.ourConcentration: At Parkhurst Medical, we place a strong emphasis on medical research to ensure that our patients have access to evidence-based treatments. Our products meet the highest quality standards.
Home.photo1Alt: medication support therapy better quality of life medical marijuana Parkhurst
Home.photo2Alt: medication support therapy better quality of life
Home.photo3Alt: quality of life symptom relief medical innovation marijuana
Home.photo4Alt: evidence-based therapies medical research marijuana safety

Products.title: Parkhurst Medical
Products.description: Shaping the future of cannabinoid therapy in Poland together
Products.firstSection: Our products meet the highest quality standards, strict control and compliance with medical regulations ensure that every product that leaves our facilities is safe for patients. We comply with the latest regulations and industry guidelines, and our products are the result of scientific research and clinical evaluations.
Products.secondSection: We work with a team of specialists and experts to ensure the effectiveness and efficiency of treatment.Clinical trials are a key part of our approach, enabling us to provide patients with products that are not only safe, but also effective in treating a variety of conditions.
Products.thirdSection: Systematic laboratory tests and analyses check the purity, chemical composition and efficacy of our products. Advanced quality checking processes ensure that we deliver products with the highest precision and in accordance with accepted standards.
Products.cooperationPharmaceuticalBody: We provide pharmaceutical wholesalers access to our range of medical products that meet the highest quality standards. We offer attractive collaboration conditions and support in delivering products directly to wholesale customers.
Products.cooperationPharmacyHeader: Collaboration with pharmacies and pharmacy points
Products.cooperationPharmacyBody: Our products are available to pharmacies and pharmacy points that value quality, safety, and effectiveness. We offer a wide range of medical products that can meet diverse patient needs.
Products.productsCarouselAlt: Parkhurst Medical cannabis research-based therapy best quality products

Terms.title: Parkhurst Medical
Terms.description: Jointly shaping the future of cannabinoid therapy in Poland
Terms.firstSection: Dear User, in connection with the change of personal data protection regulations and the application of the Regulation of the European Parliament and of the Council (EU) on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) 'GDPR', we inform you that:
Terms.secondSection: The personal data administrator of the service and store users (hereinafter also collectively referred to as the Service or Store) Parkhurst Medical Poland is Parkhurst Medical Sp. z o. o., headquartered in Świebodzice, Rynek 8/4, 58-160 Świebodzice, a company entered into the National Court Register maintained by the District Court for Wrocław-Fabryczna in Wrocław, IX Economic Department of the National Court Register, under the KRS number: 0001074394, (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company').
Terms.thirdSection: The Company processes personal data for the purposes of:
Terms.purposesFirs: sales of products offered by the Company, including proper conduct of transactions and obtaining feedback on products or services offered by the Company, based on the consent given while using the contact form,
Terms.purposesSecond: consideration of complaints, pursuit and defense in case of mutual claims, realizing the legally justified interest of the personal data Administrator, i.e., on the basis of Art. 6 para 1 point f of the GDPR,
Terms.fourthSection: The law requires the Company to process Users' data for tax and accounting purposes. For other purposes, data provided by the User can be used only with their prior, separate consent.
Terms.fifthSection: Contact with the Seller via the contact form requires provision of personal data. The provision of personal data is voluntary, but necessary to conclude an agreement with the Company and execute the concluded agreement. Lack of such consent prevents the use of the Store's services. Contact with the Seller requires providing the following personal data:
Terms.sixthSection: Personal data will be processed for the period necessary for the performance of the agreement, and after that period for the purposes and for the time and to the extent required by law or to secure possible claims, or until the withdrawal of consent.
Terms.seventhSection: Recipients of personal data will be:
Terms.recipientsSecond: entities cooperating in the service of the Parkhurst Medical Poland Service - by virtue of appropriate personal data processing entrustment agreements
Terms.recipientsThird: entity providing online payment services - by virtue of appropriate personal data processing entrustment agreements.
Terms.eighthSection: Every person has the right to access their data and to rectify, delete or limit processing, oppose processing, transfer data, as well as the right to withdraw consent at any time, according to the legal provisions. Withdrawing consent does not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.
Terms.ninethSection: In case of doubts related to the processing of personal data, every person can contact the Company with a request for information. In addition, everyone has the right to lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority - the President of the Office for Personal Data Protection.
